# Data Sources {#data-sources}

## CRM

**Source:** Direct connection to CRM database

**Schedule:** Updated weekly Tuesday mornings

## FAME

We are dependent on FAME delivering accurate and timely data sets to our data warehouse.

### Attendance {.unnumbered}

**Source:** Advantage and Freedom file exports from FAME

**Schedule:** Updated daily at the end of day

### Adhoc Student Data {.unnumbered}

**Source:** Advantage and Freedom file exports from FAME

**Schedule:** Updated Monday mornings (1/week)

## Meevo

**Source:** Meevo Daily Data Stream API (https://dds.meevoapi.com/Introduction.htm)

**Schedule:** Updated daily at the end of day
